lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Browns’ Pro Bowl center, LeCharles Bentley, will miss this season after tearing a tendon in his knee in practice yesterday. Bentley signed with the Browns on the opening day of the free-agency period in March. He spent the past four seasons with the New Orleans Saints.
